title: John Smoltz Talks Mentality to Pitch, QBs Who Played Baseball & Deion Sanders
itunes:title: John Smoltz Talks Mentality to Pitch, QBs Who Played Baseball & Deion Sanders
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by Baseball Hall of Famer John Smoltz as he talks about the mentality of getting ready to pitch and how the approach is like a QB, he touches on NFL QBs who played baseball, discusses playing baseball with Deion Sanders and much more (2:15). After that, the pair react to the main points from Smoltz's interview and they expand on what they learned from it (25:54). To wrap up the show, DJ and Bucky give their thoughts on the new onside kick proposal (39:44).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
